name: Wine Country Trattoria
location: Disney California Adventure Park, Performance Corridor

items.title: Pull-Apart Cheese Bread
items.description: Sun-dried Tomato Focaccia, Whipped Herb Ricotta, Mozzarella, Tomato Coulis, Chile Flakes and Micro Herbs

items.title: Fried Calamari
items.description: Lightly-breaded Calamari and Haricots Vert served with Pepperoncini Aïoli

items.title: Winter Salad
items.description: Hearty Greens, Radicchio, Candied Walnuts, Gorgonzola, Cranberries, Apple Vinaigrette and Wine-Poached Apples

items.title: Tuscan Soup
items.description: Caramelized Fennel and Leeks, Potatoes, Italian Sausage, Kale, Fennel Pollen, and Lemon Leek Oil

items.title: Braised Short Rib Marsala
items.description: Roasted Garlic Mashed Potatoes, Seasonal Vegetables and Marsala Sauce

items.title: Chicken Parmesan
items.description: Breaded and Fried Chicken Breast with Marinara and Mozzarella served over Spaghetti

items.title: Shrimp Alfredo
items.description: Creamy Mushroom Alfredo sauce tossed in Fettuccine with Parsley, Garlic and Chili Flakes

items.title: Winter Salad with Shrimp
items.description: Hearty Greens, Radicchio, Candied Walnuts, Gorgonzola, Cranberries, Apple Vinaigrette, Wine-Poached Apples with Grilled Shrimp

items.title: Hearty Short Rib Pasta
items.description: Served with Broccolini, Caramelized Onions, Mushrooms, Rich Creamy Sauce and Pappardelle Pasta

items.title: Pan-seared Salmon
items.description: Parsnip Purée, Warm Italian Salad, Farro, Toasted Almonds, Arugula and Pickled Fennel tossed in Tomato Coulis

items.title: Spaghetti Bolognese
items.description: A rich Ragu of Beef, Italian Sausage, Vegetables and Seasonings

items.title: Spaghetti Aglio Olio
items.description: Lightly tossed with Seasonal Vegetables, Garlic, Chile Flakes and Lemon Olive Oil-White Wine Sauce

items.title: Raspberry Crème Brûlée Tart
items.description: Raspberries and Coconut Chantilly

items.title: Chicken Breast
items.description: served with choice of two (2) Selections and choice of Small Lowfat Milk or Small DASANI® Water. Meets Disney Nutrition Guidelines for Complete Meals without Substitutions

Fountain Beverages
items.description: Coca-Cola®, Diet Coke®, Coca-Cola® Zero Sugar, Sprite®, Fanta® Orange, Minute Maid® Zero Sugar Lemonade and Iced Tea

items.title: Boulevardier
items.description: Campari, Sweet Vermouth and Old Forester Bourbon

items.title: Pozione Verde
items.description: Midori, Coconut Rum, Coconut Cream and Pineapple Juice

items.title: Italian Margarita
items.description: 1800 Silver Tequila, Lime Juice, Sweet-and-Sour and a float of Disaronno Amaretto

items.title: Trattoria Old Fashioned
items.description: Bulleit Rye Bourbon, Rosemary Reduction, Bitters and Club Soda

items.title: Passion Fruit Mule
items.description: Tito's Handmade Vodka, Lime Juice, Ginger Beer and Passion Fruit Liqueur

items.title: Frozen Limoncello
items.description: Meletti Limoncello, Sweet-and-Sour and Lemonade

items.title: Pineapple Crush
items.description: Hendrick’s Gin, Captain Morgan Original Spiced Rum, Orgeat, Passion Fruit, Pineapple Juice and Lemon

items.title: Prickly Pear Mojito
items.description: Bacardi Rum, Peach Schnapps, Prickly Pear, Agave, Lime Juice, Soda Water

items.title: White Sangria
items.description: Beso Del Sol White Sangria made from 100% natural blend of Airén White Spanish Grapes, Lemon, Peach, and Mango Juices

items.title: Red Sangria
items.description: Beso Del Sol Red Sangria made from 100% natural marriage of Spanish Tempranillo Grapes, Orange, Blood Orange, and Lemon Juices with a touch of Natural Cinnamon

items.title: Spritz Flight
items.description: Aperol Spritz, Limoncello Spritz and Elderflower Spritz

items.title: Garibaldi
items.description: Aperol and Blood Orange Juice

items.title: Aperol Spritz
items.description: Aperol and La Marca Prosecco topped with Soda Water

items.title: Trattoria Aperitivo
items.description: Cappelletti Aperitivo, Storyhouse California Dry Gin and Lemon Juice

items.title: Amaro Rinfrescante
items.description: Amaro Averna Liqueur topped with Sparkling Mineral Water and a splash of Lemon Juice

items.title: Lemon Basil Spritz
items.description: Limoncello, Absolut Citron, Prosecco, Lemon Juice, and Fresh Basil

items.title: Bicicletta
items.description: Pinot Grigio and Campari topped with Sparkling Water

items.description: Italian Pale Lager, Rome, Italy (5% ABV)
